channel.title: Need a server status
channel.description: need a server status that says if server is offline or online. Plus can you get one that says how meny people is online? Thanks for your help. R4nger 0wnz.

item.title: Need a server status
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[code]I wrote this when I was first learning PHP, so it is not that great…

[CODE]<?php

$ip = “65.75.251.118”;
$port= “5555”;
$online = ‘Online’;
$offline = ‘Server is currently offline’;

if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5))
{
echo “$offline”;
}
else
{
echo “$online”;
}
?>[/CODE]
Save that as a PHP file and upload it to a webhost. You will need to change the IP and Port obviously. If you don’t understand how to use this, then you don’t deserve it, so unless your posting to thank me ;), don’t ask me a question.[/code]

Read full topic
